name: WiX Include File
summary: Learn about .WXI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: An example of the <Include> root file is below: <Include> <Feature Id='MyFeature' Title='My 1st Feature' Level='1'> <ComponentRef Id='MyComponent' /> </Feature> </Include>

description: File created by the WiX toolset, a Windows installer developing program; contains a top-level container element called, <Include>, which is the root element of the file; similar to header (.H) files used by C++ code.
